title: gururAyara nambirO
sahitya:
gururAyara nambirO mArutiyemba


anupallavi

  gururAyara nambi biDade yAvAgalu duritava kaLedu sadgatiya paDevarella


caraNam 1    vanadiya manOvEgadi langhisi mahi tanujaya shOka tApava kaLedu 
vanavu pErODana kittIDADi idirAda danujara sadedu lankeya tanna sakhagitta
    caraNam 2    kaurava baka hiDimba kIcakaremba duruLa santatiyella neggotti 
ghOra pAtaki dushyAsana rakutava hIri mudadi munivairiya bhajisida
    caraNam 3    jIvEsharondemba durvAdiya kubhAva shAstragaLella taridOTIsi 
kOvidarige sad bhASya sudeyanittu dEva purandara viTTala sEvakanAda
